column2: The Bokor. You chose a difficult path. {nl}Refer to the instructions in Adventure Journal and make your own doll.
You can only get it by yourself. {nl}Check your Adventure Journal on how you can make the doll.
Congratulations, a new Bokor is born. {nl}When I first chose the path of Bokor, I started by creating a doll of my own.
Peltasta Master
How can you bear the name of Peltasta if you can't even handle that?
Good. {nl}I hope for your growth lead to saving the world.
Highland Master
Hurry. {nl} It's a simple challenge, but Vubbes are a threat to the Miner's Village.
Good work, I permit your initiation in becoming a Highlander. {Nl} Keep up with your hard work and dedication.
Pyromancer Master
I can see that you want to learn magic from me but I can't teach just anyone. {nl}I will see how well you can assist my research and then decide.
Good work. Thanks to you I can go on to the next step for my research. {nl}I will teach you Pyromancer magic as promised.
Good, you're here. I need you to defeat the evil spirits I summon. {nl}I will record the unique wavelength that is transmitted in the process.
I am researching on the 4th state of matter. {nl}It is impossible without the cooperation of Bokor Master who deals with the spirits.
Yes, that's great. {nl}Tell Pyromancer Master that we have all the materials we need.
Good. {nl}That study is being done with Bokor Master so go to her and she'll tell you what to do.
Cryomancer Master
You want to learn Cryomancer magic from me? {nl}Sure I'll teach you. Only if you take care of something first.
Pyromancer Master is not around. {nl}Well, it's an easy task.
Don't feel guilty about it. You did a good job. {nl}I'll have your back from now on so you don't need to worry.
It's sneaking into Pyromancer Master's room and opening a box. {nl}And what's inside the box..  Well, you better just kill it off.
This will be enough. {nl}My magic is not easy so you need to catch up hard.
Your will to learn something from me is good but I have a favor to ask. {nl}We can only continue our talk if you say you'd do it. {nl}
Lydia Schaffen's stuff is like the divine materials for us archers. {nl}I wish I can have it even if I had to give all my fortune.
I never imagined that I would see this myself. {nl}Thank you. I will teach you thoroughly from now so you better be prepared.
I heard the lost lens of telescope in Star Tower is in Crystal Mines 1st Floor. {nl}Get me that lens before other masters find out and I'll teach you my skills.
So you want to learn the arrow from me.. Then I have a mission for you. {nl}I will decide depending on how well you accomplish the mission.
Evonipon.. I will never forgive that.
Hunter Master
You collected all the books. Good job. {nl}I will teach you the skill of hunters as promised.
You got some sure results. I will teach you from now on. {nl}I hope you live up to my expectations.
I heard the bats in Crystal Mines 1st Floor have special venom. {nl}I'm sure it's the venom used by assassin Ebonipon. Bring me that venom.
Barbarian Master
You can grasp the opponent's abilities by facing them sword on sword. {nl}Prove to me that you are a true warrior and I will lead you in becoming a real Barbarian.
You indeed qualify as a warrior. {nl}I will make you a true Barbarian.
I understand that you want to be stronger with spear. {nl}Complete the mission I assign to you and I will teach you my spearmanship.
I understand your will to become stronger. {nl}I think you have what it takes to be with spear.
Psychokino Master
The Matsums attacked you? {nl}Since the Matsums accepted the Matsum dolls as their friends, I consider it successful.
Good work. {nl}You've done a good job as my assistant so I'll teach you what a Psychokino truly is.
My research is about the methods of shifting psychokinesis to substance of matter. {nl}In other words.. It's spreading brainwash by using some medicine.
Linker Master
Talent is very important for Linkers. {nl}Closing one's heart is easy but opening others' hearts needs special talents. {nl}
I will test if you have that talent.
Great job. {nl}But this is only a preparation for the test. {nl}
It is just reality for normal people but if you have the talent of a Linker, {nl}you will be able to find the hidden world. {nl}Find the book from there and bring it to me.
You brought the book. You have passed the test. {nl}Please read that book as your determination as a Linker.
Skills of a Sapper.. Then surely you must pay for it. {nl}Not to me. Instead, I want you to pay donation to Cleric Master in Klaipeda. {nl}Around 5000 silvers?
Oh, this. I saw it somewhere.. hmm.. looks familiar.. {nl}Well I'll take it with thanks since you're giving it to me.
Huh, this is the tool I lost. {nl}Thank you. Where has it been.
Did you forget about the donation? {nl}It's 5000 silver.
Cleric Master
Thank you in the name of Goddess.{nl}I promise the donations will be used for people who were hurt by the monsters. {nl}
I used to be a thief but I came to realize certain things and got my hands off it. {nl}But there is a little load left on my mind.. and I will really end it this time {nl}
Anyway, you did a good job. {nl}Let's get along well from now on, teaching and learning from each other.
I'm looking for a book. Four books of Lydia Schaffen. {nl}If you help me find the books, I will teach you my skills.
The book used to be in Miner's town but it was lost when the Vubbes raided. {nl} Try going to the Vubbe Outpost.
It's this book. You will need this book if you dream to be the best Archer. {nl}I will make you a copy if you collect all the books.
This is of good quality. Hunter Master will be pleased. {nl}You can take the book. {nl}
Archer Master in Klaipeda has the next book. {nl}He's not a mean person so he will give you the book if you ask nicely. {nl}
He is helping to repair the damaged city wall. {nl}I heard there were rocks moved to Miner's Village so bringing him that rock can be a way to ask.
Did Hunter Master send this rock? {nl}If it's Lydia Schaffen's book, you could have just asked. But thank you anyway.
The last book is with Ranger Master in Klaipeda. {nl}Give her this pouch. {nl}I could go myself but we're not really comfortable seeing each other.
Don't ask why. Work is work and it's a fact that we don't want to face each other.
This pouch.. Did you come for Hunter Master? {nl}Here. Give her this book.
I don't want to act mean when she's coming in humble.
These leather will be enough. {nl}Go to Quarrel Shooter Master before someone else takes it.
This rock will be useful in repairing the wall. {nl}Bring it to Archer Master quickly.
Are you the one who wants to learn my skills? {nl}Great, I was just looking for someone to help me find Lydia Shaffen's book. {nl}You're going to help right?
There is one in Miner's Village but it was lost when the Vubbes raided. {nl} I'm sure it's in the Vubbe Outpost.
Oh yes, this is it. {nl}This will be helpful for people like you, who dreams of becoming a Quarrel Shooter. {nl}I will give you a copy if you collect all books.
Three more left. {nl}I think you can get one of it by handing some money to the Hunter Master..
The problem is, I'm broke.
You mean the book of Lydia Schaffen that I have? {nl}I'll hand it over for 5000 silvers.
Well then, thanks for your help. {nl}Around 5000 silver will do. {nl}
5000 silver.. Yup, that's right. {nl}I'll give you the book as promised.
Well.. Archer Master must have the next book. {nl}He's still into repairing the wall so wouldn't he like it if you get him some stones? {nl}I could take it to him myself but.. owwww.. my back..
Archer Master has the next book. {nl}He's not a mean person so he will give you the book if you ask nicely. {nl}
I heard he is helping to repair the damaged city wall. {nl}There are rocks moved to Miner's Village so he'll be moved if you bring him that rock.
Did Hunter Master send this rock? {nl}If it's Lydia Schaffen's book, you could have just asked. But thank you anyway.
Now, for the last book. {nl}Give this pouch to Ranger Master and get the book.
Did the Quarrel Shooter send this? {nl}Thanks. I'll hand over the book as promised.
Bring the book quickly. {nl}I can't hold it.
Great, it's this one! {nl}I'll teach you the skills of Quarrel Shooter as promised. {nl}
This rock will be useful in repairing the wall. {nl}Bring it to Archer Master quickly.
If you want to learn more of my skills, there is a condition. {nl}I want you to help me find the four books of Lydia Schaffen.
I heard the first book was with a resident in Miner's Village before the Vubbes attacked. {nl}So I think it could be in the Vubbe Outpost.
I'm surprised you found it faster than I expected. {nl}And it's in a good state. {nl}
I think you might be able to buy the next book from Hunter Master..{nl}I'm broke after fixing the wall with my money. Haha..
You mean the second book of Lydia Schaffen? {nl}I'll hand it over for 5000 silver.
I think around 5000 silver will do. {nl}I heard that's the book's value.
Quality is fine enough. Archer Master must also be pleased. {nl}Here, I've prepared a copy so take it.
Now there is one book left. {nl}Give this pouch to ranger master and get the book. {nl}
Did Archer Master send you? {nl}Well, good work. I'll give you the book as promised.
Isn't the book ready yet? {nl}I want to see all of Lydia Schaffen's book ASAP..
Finally it's all here. {nl}I'll teach you my skills as promised.
I have some books to collect. It's Lydia Schaffen's books. {nl}I'll teach you my skills if you collect the books. What do you say?
The first book was in the Miner's Village but it was gone after the Vubbes attacked. {nl}I assume the book may be in the Vubbe Outpost?
Oh, that's pretty good. {nl}It will he helpful for you to read it too.
The problem is the Hunter Master. I really don't want to see her face. {nl}So you go and get the next book from her.
You mean the book I have? {nl}Well, okay. I'll hand it over for 5000 silver.
I think around 5000 silver will do. {nl}Can you spare that much?
The book is in good condition.{nl}Now, bring the book to Archer Master. {nl}
Archer Master in Klaipeda has the last book. {nl}I heard he is repairing the wall so this might help you get the book?
I heard there is a rock useful for repairing the wall in Miner's Village. {nl}Bring that to Archer Master as present.
Did Ranger Master send this rock? {nl}If it's Lydia Schaffen's book, you could have just asked. Anyway, thank you.
Finally collected it all. Good work. {nl}I will teach you my skills as promised but it's your job to keep track and follow.
You got some pretty good leather. {nl}Bring it to Quarrel Shooter Master.
Why did you bring that to me? Take it to Archer Master quickly.
Sculptor Tesla
Sculptor's talent is important but so is having the eye to see important materials. {nl}I will help you learn my skills if you bring me the blue crystals I'm looking for.
That is the problem. {nl}The Yekub swallowed it as soon as it was found in Miner's Village 2nd Floor.
Oh, this is it. {nl}I have a lot of time so I will teach you slowly.
You want to learn swordsmanship of Highlander from me? {nl}I will consider it if you can get the cooperation of Peltastas.
Thank you for the supplies but Highlander Master wouldn't have sent you for nothing. {nl}Tell me what you want. {nl}
An overall cooperation between the Masters. Alright. {nl}Tell him that the Peltastas are in it.
If the Masters unite, it won't be far until the kingdom rises again. {nl}You did a good job. I will teach you my swordsmanship.
That is enough. {nl}Get the Peltasta's cooperation with it.
We, Peltastas, consider our duties as humans the most important.
I was about to ask for aid in search. {nl}
These.. are their keepstakes. {nl}We can at least give the keepstakes to their families. Thank you. {nl}
I will tell the Highlander Master myself so please go back. {nl}Good work.
It might not be a pleasant feeling but that's good enough. {nl}I will allow your learning from Peltasta as promised.
I need to gather the energy of fire for my research but I just don't have time. {nl}If you gather it for me, I will help you learn the magic of Pyromancers.
Be careful. The port will break if you don't keep an eye on it.
There is an important book that I'm looking for. {nl}If you get me that book, I will help you learn the magic of Cryomancers.
Did you say you'll find the book? {nl}Sorry but you're late.
I heard rumors that it's in Miner's Village but I don't know the exact source of it. {nl}Maybe the Mayor would know..
The Vubbes took all the books when they attacked. {nl}Maybe they will use it for fire in their outpost.
If there was something like that, we would have taken care of it. {nl}You go and try looking for it.
You found it. Great job. {nl}You'll have to try real hard to follow my trainings.
I heard the book was last seen in Miner's Village. {nl}It's a very important book so maybe the Mayor might know.
You must have found the book. I don't know but congratulations. {nl}Why don't you go back to the one who's waiting for that book?
Krivis Master
Krivis should be free from the constraints of humans and dedicate themselves to the clergy. {nl}It's by offering dedication prayers to all the Goddess Statues in Siauliai. {nl}
Repent. {nl}Ask the Goddess for forgiveness and be born brand new.
I can feel that you are full of the Goddess's blessings. {nl}Welcome to your new world as Krivis.
Swordsman Master
An old saying goes, fight to death and you will survive. {nl}I will be able to teach you if you come to realize what it means.
You haven't realized what it means. {nl}Fight a bit more.
Right.. Now do you understand. {nl}Remember that you're a Swordsman and devote yourself.
The most important thing for Priests is the belief in Goddess and to prove it. {nl}Exorcise the soldiers possessed with evil spirits with the name of Goddess.
That soldier is being taken care of in Miner's Village. {nl}Your sincerity will become your strength.
Your sincerity has been proven. {nl}We will walk together in the name of Goddess.
Learning magic from me comes after helping my research. {nl}Let's talk about the talent problem afterwards.
You've gathered it all. {nl}Now let's move on to the next step.
Klaipeda is far from the capital and was barely attacked by the monsters. {nl}I paid attention to that point and I am studying to make a great magic circle. {nl}
And for that, I need accumulated data. {nl}Can you use this scroll around the city?
I've marked on the map where you need to install it. {nl}You need to use every single one of it.
Good work. I've gathered some useful data with your help. {nl}Research is complete so you can come to train anytime.
You must have come to learn the faith of Clerics. {nl}I will teach you if you help treating the injured soldiers of Miner's Village.
Cleric Master shines light to many at such young age. {nl}Take this holy water and go to the patients quickly.
You need the holy water to treat them. {nl}You should get the holy water from Priest Master and Krivis Master first.
If it's for Cleric Master, take as much holy water as you need. {nl}She has a beautiful heart that even this old priest would envy.
Please send my regards to Cleric Master. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess be with you.
Please send them my regards while you get holy water from the masters.
Service is what you do for others but also cleansing a reflection of yourself. {nl}I hope your wandering soul will be cleansed as you treat the patiens.
Good job. {nl}I will teach the faith of Clerics as promised.
I think that you may not have a great spear right away {nl}but you must have a spear that you are strongly attached to. {nl}How do you think about it?
Spear is the pride of Hoplites. {nl}A strong spear is something that Hoplites can boast like their name.
That's great. {nl}Alright. You have what it takes to learn spearmanship from me.
Alright. {nl}If you want my recognition, show me a spear upgraded to level 6.{nl}
You want to learn Quarrel Shooter Skills from me? {nl}Right on time. I was also looking for someone to help me.
You were sent by Quarrel Shooter Master right? {nl}You must find the map. A map hidden with Fletcher's secrets.
Sapper Master says he found some information about the book I'm looking for. {nl}Go to Siauliai Eastern Woods and meet him.
Oh, is this the map? Good job. {nl}I'll teach you my skills as promised.
Is this the map? I really can't tell. {nl}Take it to Quarrel Shooter Master.
So you came to learn more skills from me. {nl}Then go help Rodelero Masters in Fedimian. I will evaluate with that.
Did your Archer Master send you?{nl}Klaipeda is becoming stable but Fedimian is still like this.
I hear that most of Fedimian, aside from Divine Area, is buried and in need of help.
I want you to defeat the boss monster in Maze Tower. {nl}Monsters are pouring out of the Maze Tower {nl}when we don't even have enough resources to reconstruct Fedimian.
According to the scout who made it in, it was Minotaurs of Maze Tower 3rd Floor. {nl}Defeating it will be good enough as a warning.
Well done. The monsters are laying low thanks to you. {nl}Extend my gratitude to Archer Master too.
Well done. {nl}I will train you to be stronger as promised.
You want to learn the skill of Ranger from me? {nl}Okay. If you help me, I'll consider it depending on how you do.
I heard you're looking from someone who wears a hoodie and has a unique scent. {nl}
Of course I remember. It was a man with a dangerous scent. {nl}He asked about materials that not much people know about so I thought he was strange. {nl}
Eboniphon.. I will never forgive him.
How would I know his whereabouts? {nl}He asked about materials that I did not have so I told him where he could get it.
This scent.. yes, it's Eboniphon's.{nl}This will be enough. I will teach you my skills as promised.
Yes, this is the scent. {nl}It was very unique so I couldn't forget it even if I wanted to. {nl}
Hey, if you came wanting to be stronger, you've come to the right place. {nl}But you can't have it for nothing. You have to do me a favor. {nl}
Oh, right. You should be able to do it easily if you want to become a Sapper. {nl}Now you just have to help with this experiment.
Well, it's pretty simple. {nl}Check how effective this bomb is on the monsters in Siauliai Eastern Woods.
I do hope it works this time..
They fell back without much damage? {nl}Hmm, what could the problem be.. I got to check from the beginning again. {nl}
Anyway, Thanks. {nl}You can come anytime if you want to learn my skills.
You want to learn about the Bokors? {nl}Then first, get me the card that you can get from powerful monsters.
It doesn't matter which card it is as long as it's from the powerful monster. {nl}What you will bring to me is already decided.
Complete. Traveler. Promised victory. Perfect world. {nl}Full interpretation is for you to do.
Sometimes the harsh fate destined can lead to the dark future. {nl}I will lead you to the path of Bokor as promised.
I'm looking for a cat that can model but I'm old and it's not easy. {nl}Bring a suitable cat and I'll teach you my skills.
Grandpa Tesla wants a cat? {nl}Cats are all over Klaipeda Plaza but it won't be easy to catch one unless with special food.
I like cats because they do the basics. {nl}The cats have all lines.
I can give you the special food for catching a cat. {nl}If you find my father, I will give it to you for free!
I'll give you the special cat food as promised. {nl}It's made with stuff that the cats like so it should work.
Oh oh, it's that cat. {nl}I'll take you to a higher level as promised. {nl}
I've traded for a long time with Klaipeda Item Merchant who might help you.
I want you to do something in return for learning magic from me. {nl}It's simple but a little dangerous. Would you like to give it a try? {nl}
If you find it dangerous, get out quickly. {nl}I'll just have to find another disciple.
